source: (Intercom) Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for visiting and we hope you enjoyed the show! Freddy and the gang are pretty tired, but they’ll be back again next week after a few days of scheduled maintenance! Please make your way to the front of the building where you will be given novelty glasses, a voucher for one free soda refill, and where you will sign a legal disclaimer releasing us of all liability for anything that might have happened during your visit. Have an awesome night, and we’ll see you again soon!
<b>Security Network:</> You must <b>deactivate all Child Nodes</> before you can deactivate the <b>Parent Node</>.
A description of each setting goes here...
A strange mask left behind by some Faz-Technician.
A walkie-talkie of my favorite character.
Action not permitted in AR Mode.
Action not permitted in AR Mode.
Adjust camera sensitivity for keyboard look controls only.
Adjust camera sensitivity for the mouse.
Adjust gamma until you can see detail in dark shadows.
Adjust the Master Volume of all sound in the game.
Adjust the strength of the colorblind filter.
Adjust the volume of all Jumpscares in the game.
Adjust the volume of all Music in the game.
Adjust the volume of all Sound Effects in the game.
Adjust the volume of all Voices in the game.
Anti-aliasing smoothes the edges of objects.
Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
Are you sure you want to?
Are you sure you want to?
Balance the contrast so that you can see the most detail.
Call me Helpi. You can always count on me because it’s my job to help you succeed in your new job!

Charge all conduits to the correct level.
Point the Faz-Wrench at the conduit to charge it.
Choose the best preset your PC can handle.
Connect the matching holograms. Be careful not to cross lines!
Continuing will restore all control defaults
Continuing will unbind this key from the [Action] Action
Continuing will unbind this key from the {action} Action
Continuing will unbind this key from the {action} Action
Dad wouldn't tell me why they replaced Bonnie.
Deactivate the child nodes to access this security network.
Deactivate those nasty nodes and the door should open right up!
Deep Learning Super Sampling can make game look like it is running at a high resolution even when it’s not.
Do not despair. This is no dead end. Sometimes, all you need is a new perspective. Check that camera station.
Due to technical difficulties, that camera is no longer available.
Exiting Hacking Game Took {time} Seconds and completed at time {Time}
Fazbear entertainment is not responsible for potential AR traumas or lingering effects of antivirus programs on carbon-based work components.
Fear not, no progress or collectibles will be lost.
Fear not, no progress or collectibles will be lost.
Funny. It looks just like the other one.
Good job. That vent connects directly to Fazer Blast.
Gregory is lost! Help Find him!
Guess he replaced more than his teeth.
Hi, I'm Helpy! Are you in trouble?
How long Helpi's blurbs stay on screen. Ruin Only
I never slept better than I did in the daycare.
I took care of it. This area is safe now…
I used to have so much fun in the daycare.
If that doesn’t work, it is best to exit AR Mode and contact our 24 hour support line.
If you want to save your friend, you have to shut down the remaining security nodes in Bonnie Bowl and Fazer Blast.
It is recommended that technicians complete their current tasks and leave AR mode immediately.
It's all in your head. Take off the mask and take a look.
It's from that old headset game.
Just another Faz-mazing benefit of being a Class V technician. Of course, you will have to put your mask back on to get any REAL work done.
Just another Faz-mazing benefit of being a Class V technician. Of course, you will have to put your mask back on to get any REAL work done.
Kids used to put their lunches in these.
Looks like the entity has bypassed my signal jammer and activated one of its own.
Lucky for you, the transponder implant allows me to communicate wirelessly even when your mask is removed.
Lucky for you, the transponder implant allows me to communicate wirelessly even when your mask is removed.
My dad used to collect these.
New user detected. Pairing occipital transponder. Stay calm. This won’t hurt a bit.

On - Tap the crouch button to crouch.
Off - Hold the crouch button to crouch
Particles are used to create animated visual effects.
Player Control Rotation is {PlayerROT} Teleport Location is {ArrowROT}
Post Processing adds filters and other effects onto the camera lens.
Ray Tracing makes lighting look more realistic.
Redirect power flow until each active conduit is within its desired parameters.
Reminds me of the one in the lobby.
Restarting this Chapter will not reset your progress or collectibles.
SYSTEM WARNING: Unknown entity has hijacked security protocols.
Select the window mode for the game.
Select whether you want to prioritize good visuals, or faster performance.
Set how realistic Shading should appear.
Set how realistic Shadows should appear.
Set the Texture Quality of all textures in the game.
Set the intensity level of controller vibration.
Set the sensitivity of controller stick horizontal movement.
Set the sensitivity of controller stick vertical movement.
Show an aiming reticle in the HUD.
Show full screen tutorial cards. SB Only
Simply follow the input data cables to locate child nodes. Remember, security nodes are only accessible while in AR mode.
Simply, redirect the Gator Gondolas to the maintenance room. You passed the track controller as we entered the room. Of course, as a technician, I am sure you already knew this.
Simply, redirect the Gator Gondolas to the maintenance room. You passed the track controller as we entered the room. Of course, as a technician, I am sure you already knew this.
That area is on security lockdown.
That door is in “emergency lockdown” mode. Check the AR world for active security nodes.
That is a Fazbear technician remote camera station. Lucky for you, it is already deployed and has an active power supply.
That log ride was so much fun.
The colorblind filter will increase contrast and make details more visible.
The interference is strong here. You may get a better signal if you turn off the Security Nodes.
There is nothing to worry about. Everything appears to be perfectly normal. You must be seeing things.

This action will start a new Survival Mode game.
All progress will be lost!
This camera station doesn’t seem to be active, however, I am detecting an unusual signal. Put on the mask and check again.
This is a Camera Access Point
This is from that old cartoon.
This is the shortest safest path to Fazer Blast. If you prefer, there may be an elevator shaft you can climb down.
This parent node cannot be accessed until it is severed from all attached child nodes.
This parent node cannot be accessed until it is severed from all attached child nodes.
This security mask will help you find errors in the system
Too bad. The cost of those damaged Gator Gondolas will be coming out of your paycheck.
Too bad. The cost of those damaged Gator Gondolas will be coming out of your paycheck.
Try ginger! It helps with motion sickness.
Turn brightness up if white appears gray and down if black appears gray.
Turn this off to hide the crouch/standing icons
Turn this on if you experience screen tearing.
Turn this on to sprint on a Toggle instead of a Hold. Gamepad Only.
Turn this on to sprint on a Toggle instead of a Hold. Keyboard Only.
Up becomes down, and down becomes up.
View Distance sets how far away objects will appear.
WARNING: Unable to Find {name} in VODataTable
Weird. It looks just like the other one.
Well done! That was the last security node. I have located the source of your friend’s radio signal. It is coming from under the raceway.
With your own two feet, silly. If you’re tired, why not take a break?
You may get a better signal if you turn off the Security Nodes.
{Self} Capture Trigger has Overlapped with {OtherActor} at time {time}
{trigger} is DONE waiting for teleportation to finish
{trigger} is waiting for teleportation to finish
Old and outdated. A collector’s item.
After spotting Chica on a conveyor belt, Cassie enters the Bakery.
By traveling through a virtual server room, Cassie arrives at the Glamrock Beauty Salon.
Cassie finds herself in the catwalks above Monty Golf.
Cassie responds to a mysterious message from Gregory. He is trapped somewhere in the Pizzaplex.
Cassie’s strange AR encounters have led her to the Daycare.
Gregory is safe for now, but the remaining security nodes must be deactivated before Cassie can access the sinkhole under the Raceway.
In hopes of finding Gregory before Roxy does, she finally reaches the Raceway.
Once the Fazer Blast nodes are deactivated, Cassie can return to the Raceway.
Only one security node remains. Gregory is close.
Be careful crossing the oily catwalks.
Chica may respond to the camera distractions.
Deactivate the Bonnie Bowl parent nodes.
Deactivate the Fazer Blast parent nodes.
Deactivate the final node in Roxy Raceway.
Deactivate the final node! Don’t think. Just do it!
Deactivate the parent nodes and follow Roxy.
Deactivate the security nodes, then switch the ride’s path.
Don’t feel bad. It was for the best.
Don’t forget to use your mask.
Don’t you care about Gregory? Why aren’t you trying harder?
Everything is not as it seems.
Find a path to Bonnie Bowl.
Find a way into the Theater.
Find the inhibitors as well as the security nodes.
Find the inhibitors before the entity finds you.
Gregory is somewhere in the Pizzaplex.
I’m Gregory. I’m Gregory. I’m Gregory.
No way back. No choice but to continue.
Reboot the Daycare Attendant and access the Theater.
Redirect the Gator Gondola to the maintenance room.
Roxy may respond to the camera distractions.
Stay away from Monty. You are lucky to be alive.
The electrified door should be open now.
There are four child nodes to find.
There are four child nodes to find.
They never did finish the Foxy log ride. Safety concerns.
They never did finish the Foxy log ride. Safety concerns.
Turn on the generators then reboot the Attendant.
Watch out for that chattering noise?
You are approaching the Bowling Alley.
Your mask cannot be used until the Inhibitor is deactivated.
Your mask may reveal new paths.
<b>Security Conduits:</>  Security Conduits are not accessible in the V.A.N.N.I Network.
<b>Security Conduits:</> An experienced Faz Technician with good timing is needed to complete conduits with three or more tubes.
<b>Security Conduits:</> Power up all conduits to the <b>level marked on each tube</>.
<b>Security Network:</> Connect the symbols with wires to disable the <b>Parent Node</>.
<b>Security Network:</> Follow the trail from the disabled Parent Node to see what you’ve unlocked.
<b>Security Network:</> You must <b>deactivate all Child Nodes</> before you can deactivate the <b>Parent Node</>.
A camera station “Intercom” can be used as a distraction.
AR camera anomalies must be quarantined in order.
AR signal interference makes it difficult to see while disabling your mask controls. Keep your distance.
Accessing the V.A.N.N.I. Network can give you a different perspective.
An AR Inhibitor disables Mask controls until it is deactivated.
Be careful! Something dangerous lurks inside the V.A.N.N.I. Network
Deactivate the security nodes to access Gregory.
Endos don't like it when you stare.
Gregory is trapped in the Pizzaplex. Only you can save him!
Pardon our mess. Freddy Fazbear’s Mega Pizzaplex is closed for maintenance.
Some Camera Stations are only accessible in the V.A.N.N.I. Network.
The floor lights under a parent node indicate how many child nodes are attached.
Try putting on your AR Mask if you get lost.
Welcome to the Virtual Augmented Neural Network Integration unit.
Wireless signals may be visible in the V.A.N.N.I. Network.
Alert. I am picking up an anomalous entity in the V.A.N.N.I. network. Please ask this entity to leave the area immediately.
By deactivating the parent nodes, you have restored power to the east side of the Mega Pizzaplex.
Do not be surprised by your surroundings. You are still in the real world, but Fazbear Entertainment has made it better!
Don't worry about that bad entity in here. Seek comfort knowing they won't be able to track you down, at least for now.
Experienced employees use “intercom recordings” like this to direct animatronic performers to specific locations. You know, for autographs and photo ops.
Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for potential AR traumas or lingering effects of antivirus programs on carbon-based work components.
Fun trick, huh? I created it using samples of your voice.
Good job technician. You have gained access to the upper east server room.
I can’t seem to keep the entity at bay any longer. It’s not safe.
I feel it would be best if you remained in the V.A.N.N.I. Network for the time being.
I said “SHOULD” be safe. It is not safe and I am not wrong.
If you deactivate all the parent security nodes in the west, you should be able to reach your friend under the Roxy Raceway.
It appears the daycare attendant is malfunctioning. The bright light seems to disorient it.
No can do. The V.A.N.N.I. network is currently unavailable. Something seems to be jamming the signal. This is highly irregular.
That device down there is an “AR Inhibitor”. You will be unable to access the V.A.N.N.I Network until it is deactivated.
There appears to be an inhibitor in the area. The V.A.N.N.I. network is inaccessible until the inhibitor is deactivated.
These little boxes represent the active security cameras in this area. Select a camera to see what it sees.
Turn on the generators and you may have a chance to reboot its system. Once all the generators are active, use the Faz-Wrench port on the back of its face plate.
Warning. You are now leaving the V.A.N.N.I. network coverage zone.
Welcome to V.A.N.N.I., the Virtual Augmented Neural Network Integration unit.
With this Security Mask, you can locate and repair all the pesky security nodes that are locking down the mesh network here in the Mega Pizzaplex.
You should be safe from the entity here.
(???) How odd. Your guest profile is unknown to me. Who are you?
(???) Isn't there some other way for you to communicate with me besides talking so loudly?
(???) That is the security guard. She can help! No! No, I don't trust her.
(???) You saved me! You saved me!
(Candy Cadet) ...About a mother and a little boy who lived alone in a cabin in the dark woods.
(Candy Cadet) I am a Candy Cadet. Come get your candy here. I have candy all day. Every day. Candy. Candy. Candy. Candy.
(Candy Cadet) Now I will tell you a story...
(Candy Cadet) One day, the monster stopped growling and instead, listened and learned the lullaby.
(Candy Cadet) The monster always made scary noises at night, but the mother would tell the boy not to worry because it could never get out. Then she would sing the boy a lullaby to sleep.
(Candy Cadet) The next day when the mother went out to find food, the monster sang the lullaby from the basement. The little boy heard the lullaby and opened the door.
(Candy Cadet) There was a monster in the woods, but the mother caught it and kept it locked in the basement.
(Cassie) A Faz-Wrench. It's just like my dad's.
(Cassie) Ah! What are you still doing here?!
(Cassie) Chica? What happened to you? You look awful.
(Cassie) Finally. Bet I can use the mask again.
(Cassie) Fine. Am I even close? Where are you? This place is huge.
(Cassie) Freddy! Freddy? Are you ok? Please be functional...
(Cassie) Gregory! I shut down all the security nodes. I'm in the Roxy Party Garage. Am I close?
(Cassie) Gregory! Run. Roxy's after you. Gregory! Are you there?!
(Cassie) Gregory, I made it to Catwalks. You said I could get to the Raceway from here?
(Cassie) Gregory. Gregory. I can hear you.
(Cassie) Gregory? Gregory? I made it to the raceway. Are you ok?
(Cassie) Gregory? Gregory? You there? I got your message.
(Cassie) Gregory? I got your message! Where are you?
(Cassie) Gregory? I'm in Roxy Racers. Say something!
(Cassie) Gregory? Is that really you? I mean REALLY you?
(Cassie) Gregory?! Gregory!? I really don't like this place.
(Cassie) Gregory?! Security nodes? What the heck are those?
(Cassie) Helpi, I'm stuck up here! How do I get down?
(Cassie) Hey! There's another one of those signals. If it's anything like Monty Golf, it must lead to whatever's locking the theater.
(Cassie) Hm. I might be able to get a signal if I head deeper into the Raceway.
(Cassie) How do you know? How are you doing any of this?
(Cassie) I bet the doors are open now.
(Cassie) I bet those security nodes are all the way down there.
(Cassie) I better find a way out before it comes back.
(Cassie) I can't get the mask off again!
(Cassie) I don't get it. Why would Gregory tell me to come to this old place, and then not be here?
(Cassie) I don't hear anything. I hope I'm not too late.
(Cassie) I got kicked out of that V.A.N.N.I. Network! You said you got rid of that rabbit thing. What happened?
(Cassie) I gotta get off this thing!
(Cassie) I really really really hate heights.
(Cassie) I really think I need to go get help or call the police.
(Cassie) I swear that doorway was blocked.
(Cassie) I would totally shoot those targets.
(Cassie) I'm in Daycare. Is there a way out of here?
(Cassie) It looks like a speaker box.
(Cassie) It looks like that target's connected to the raised catwalk.
(Cassie) It won't work. I have to turn off that inhibitor thing.
(Cassie) Look at all the wires and stuff.
(Cassie) Look. No more vents. Every single time I get in one, it breaks or something jumps out at me.
(Cassie) Never mind. I'll use the vent.
(Cassie) No way I'm going in there without a flashlight.
(Cassie) No way. I walk through a big screen, and now I'm in Superstar Daycare. NO way this is real. That screen was there before I looked at the camera. I swear.
(Cassie) No way. I'm not going in there without a flashlight.
(Cassie) No! No no no no! Come on!
(Cassie) Of course not. So, Security Node and tracking controller, whatever that is.
(Cassie) Ow, my head. Where'd that freaky Monty thing go?
(Cassie) Roxy... I'm sorry. I'm so sorry...
(Cassie) Security? What are you talking about? None of this makes sense!
(Cassie) She hasn't found him yet. I better find him first.
(Cassie) That door's electrified. Something's gotta be powering it.
(Cassie) That rabbit thing's back again! You said it was safe here.
(Cassie) That was too close. I was almost a Cassie sandwich.
(Cassie) There's no way I'm getting near that.
(Cassie) This vent is creaky. I really hope it doesn't faaaall!!
(Cassie) Ugh! I'm gonna puke. How did I get over here?
(Cassie) Ugh... Another teleporter. I hate those things.
(Cassie) Under Roxy Racers? That's all the way on the other side. I'm not even close.
(Cassie) Under the raceway... Helpi, how do I get down there?
(Cassie) Weird. It's not a Bonnie mask.
(Cassie) Well, it looks like someone poured concrete over the door? How am I supposed to get rid of concrete?
(Cassie) What are those things? They look like the DJ!
(Cassie) What is that stuff? Weird battery acid?
(Cassie) What is that? Maybe if I get up there I can see better.
(Cassie) What's this thing? I think it's supposed to power the door.
(Cassie) Why are there burners everywhere? It's like the inside of an oven.
(Cassie) Why can't I remove the mask? It's stuck to my head!
(Cassie) Yes, I can! What happened here? It looks like the whole place fell in.
(Cassie) You want me to reboot you? With this?
(Cassie) You're a bit late! This thing in the basement sounds just like you. How do I know this IS you for real?
(Cassie) You're not Gregory. What are you?
(Eclipse) Come back soon and have a faz-eriffic day!

(Eclipse) Warning! Warning! Child in danger. Safety mode active - Little girl, you can't be in here. It's dangerous. I need to clean up before we open in the morning! This place will be flooded with kids.
(Gregory) ...For whatever reason, they react to your flashlight.
(Gregory) <(>whisper</> Good, now find the other generator.
(Gregory) <(>whisper</> Hurry! Go to the Attendant and fix him!
(Gregory) <(>whisper</> I'm in the sinkhole under the Raceway!
(Gregory) <(>whisper</> Look in the camera, the door is open...
(Gregory) <(>whisper</> The Daycare Attendant hates the light.
(Gregory) <(>whisper</> The camera is the way forward...
(Gregory) <(>whisper</> Yes it is! Look at it!
(Gregory) Almost. There is still one node left that's keeping the underground sealed.
(Gregory) Are you there? Are you there? I'm trapped.
(Gregory) Cassie! I'm ok. I found a spot to hide.
(Gregory) Cassie! You really need to get back on the Gator Gondola and go the the maintenance room.
(Gregory) Cassie!! Cassie!! Can you hear me?

(Gregory) Cassie. It's me. I think I need to explain a few things. You were never supposed to go to the Pizzaplex. That thing in the sinkhole tricked you. I really don't know what it is, but it's been trapped down here a really long time. That M.X.E.S. security program was designed to keep it hidden, but you shut down the security. Now it's free.
(Gregory) Cassie. Stay away from that thing. It's sending out some sort of distress signal and Monty is responding.
(Gregory) Cassie? Can you hear me? I finally have a clear signal!
(Gregory) Deactivate her and save me. Save me Cassie. Please. It's so dark down here.
(Gregory) Deactivate the Security Node. Then use the track controller.
(Gregory) Don't stop looking for me. I need your help.
(Gregory) Get to the Daycare theater. There's a way down to the catwalks. Should help you get to the Raceway...
(Gregory) Help! Something grabbed me... It... won't let me go! You have to find me... I'm trapped in the... sinkhole under the Raceway!
(Gregory) Hold on... The schematics say there's a way to redirect the Gondolas to the Maintenance room.
(Gregory) I can hear you. Can you hear me?
(Gregory) I figured it out. The signal was leading Monty to your location. You got out of there just in time. If you see it again, keep your distance.
(Gregory) I'll explain it all when you get here.
(Gregory) I'm here, but you can't see me.
(Gregory) I've been trying to reach you all night! I'm not at the Pizzaplex! Something is trying to trick you.
(Gregory) If you can hear me. Turn off all security. Turn it all off.
(Gregory) Is someone there? Help! Can you hear me?
(Gregory) Is someone there? Help! Can you hear me?
(Gregory) Is there another option? You need to get out of there now!
(Gregory) It's not your fault. I know you did it for me. To save me... but make sure it doesn't follow you.
(Gregory) It's not your fault. I know you did it for me. To save me... but we can't risk being followed. I'm sorry. <(>elevator falls</>
(Gregory) Just follow the sound of my voice.
(Gregory) My friend has access to the building maps. Just follow <(>static</> instructions.
(Gregory) Roxy is the final node. You need to deactivate her.
(Gregory) Security nodes! Find them and turn them all off! I can't get out until that happens!
(Gregory) Something tunneled out... broke everything. Now I'm stuck here!
(Gregory) That thing is here again. I gotta hide. Save me, Cassie, please.
(Gregory) That's a Security Node. Find the child nodes first and deactivate them!
(Gregory) The Gator Grub door is open, you should be able to find a path to the Daycare through the security office.
(Gregory) The security system won't let you leave unless you deactivate the child nodes first.
(Gregory) Turn off the nodes in the Salon to follow Roxy. Hurry! She's close.
(Gregory) Well, what are you waiting for?
(Gregory) What? How is that supposed to help? There's no time!
(Gregory) Yeah, with MY help. I updated Helpi with a signal jammer. That rabbit thing won't bother you anymore.
(Gregory) You did great! You're getting closer!
(Maskbot) Hi! Free mask! Please take a mask!
(Maskbot) Take a mask. Take a mask.
(Moon) It won't work. Take your nap! No more Sun!
(Moon) NO more Sun. No light! Forever night.
(Moon) Naughty! Naughty! It's time for your nap!!
(Moon) Nggggh. Hrrr. Naughty! Naughty! Make it stop! The light makes us hurt! Grind Grind! Grinding gears inside my head! We can't move. Error! Error!
(Roxy) Cassie. Get out of here. Run!
(Roxy) Do you really think we won't find you?
(Roxy) Do you still like carrot cake?
(Roxy) Hey Kid, come on out. We're only trying to help.
(Roxy) I love carrot cake. Happy birthday, Cassie... <(>powers down</>
(Roxy) I remember because you are number one - twice.
(Roxy) I'm sure your friends will show up this time.
(Roxy) If I remember correctly, it is on the 11th.
(Roxy) It has been some time since I saw you last.
(Roxy) We have looked everywhere. He is gone.
(Roxy) Who's there?! You can't hide from me.
(Roxy) You might as well give up.
(Roxy) Your special day. I remember... your special day.
(Staffbot) Cassie. Cassie. Cassie. Is that you? Cassie. Cassie Cassie. Is that you?
(Staffbot) Cassie. Cassie. Cassie. Is that you? Cassie. Cassie. Is that you?
(Staffbot) Do you need assistance? Do you need assistance? Do you need assistance?
(Sun) Lights on! Lights on! Turn generators on!
(Sun) NO! It's not safe yet! Turn on the other generator!

(Sun) Nap time. Nap time. No crafts or treats to share. Nap time. Nap time. The googly eyes just stare. Play clay all is crumbled dry. Spilled tempera and glues. No laughs. No crafts. Just go away. No more sunny hues.
(Sun) New friend? New friend! I am trapped in a nap!
(Sun) No! Turn on the generators! Why aren't you listening?!
(Sun) Reboot! Reboot! We need to be whole!
Happy fazbear birthday! Pizza, games and cakes. Open all your presents until your tummy aches. You are one year older on your special day. When this song is over, you'll be on your way.
Happy fazbear birthday! Pizza, games and cakes. Open all your presents until your tummy aches. You are one year older on your special day. When this song is over, you'll be on your way.
This is your 10 minute warning. The next party needs to set up.
This is your 10 minute warning. The next party needs to set up.
